attributes.additional_details:
We have arguments in all the regions but everyone is special even the English (whoever they may be) but no has asked us as a nation and everyone seems to Know what we think.

All citizens should be asked if they want devolution in the UK. the vote should have as the answers , yes,
no,
it's down to the region concerned or
don't care.

Details should be kept of regional variation in voting and if the answer is no, don't care or less than 50% vote we all stay together for 50 years to overcome our difficulties together and save unecessary expense.

If 50% Nationally vote for devolution the UK is  devolved to seperate states if less than 50 % nationally but any region votes for independence that region can leave the union.

suggested regions.

England, Scotland, Wales, NI, Cornwall/Wessex, Northumbria, Mercia and London/East Anglia.

Let the People of the UK decide.
